00289 BEGIN_PACK
00290 typedef struct PACK
00291 {
00292   ShortAddr_t shortAddr; 
00293   ExtAddr_t   extAddr; 
00294 } NodeAddr_t;
00295 END_PACK
00296 
00297 BEGIN_PACK
00298 typedef struct PACK
00299 {
00300   ShortAddr_t         shortAddr; 
00301   ExtAddr_t           extAddr; 
00302   MAC_CapabilityInf_t capabilityInfo; 
00303 } ChildInfo_t;
